item.title: Rushmoor web map hosting options
item.description: This first example was created with the ESRI javascript API, using a dataset hosted on Rushmoors AGOL cloud server: #viewDiv { padding: 10; margin: 10; height: 450px; width: 750px; } This second map was created by using the ESRI web app builder. It has an option to 'embed in website' which will generate html without any effort : The code generated from the embed in website option is as follows:
